content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 8 main components
- It consists of 3 horizontal layers with yellow rectangular blocks
- 2 green vertical blocks in the middle section
- 2 orange cylindrical blocks at the bottom
- 1 orange triangular block on top

Spatial arrangement:
- Bottom layer: Yellow horizontal block with two orange cylinders
- Middle layer: Yellow horizontal block with two green vertical blocks
- Top layer: Yellow horizontal block with orange triangular block

Here's the step-by-step assembly order:

{
    Step1: Move block with index 4 (bottom yellow horizontal block)
    Step2: Move block with index 8 (left orange cylinder)
    Step3: Move block with index 10 (right orange cylinder)
    Step4: Move block with index 4 (middle yellow horizontal block)
    Step5: Move block with index 2 (left green vertical block)
    Step6: Move block with index 2 (right green vertical block)
    Step7: Move block with index 4 (top yellow horizontal block)
    Step8: Move block with index 12 (orange triangular block)
}

The selected blocks maintain their exact orientations as shown in the dictionary image, and the assembly order ensures stability by building from bottom to top.
